whole_free.name: Whole, Free
whole_free.description: Win all 5 trials and escape punishment

flavor_texts.after_unlock: Thanks for playing until the end :D

opportunist.name: Opportunist
opportunist.description: Buy all items and perks. ({current_progress}/{count_goal} bought)

flavor_texts.before_unlock: Put the money into good use.
flavor_texts.during_unlock: Yay you saw all the effects…
flavor_texts.after_unlock: Just didn’t want all that effort to draw to be a waste :D

straight_man.name: Straight Man [i](slang)[/i]
straight_man.description: Win all 5 trials by only mashing keys

flavor_texts.before_unlock: They say hard work beats talent…
flavor_texts.after_unlock: Your keyboard did not appreciate that but thanks for playing

hole_me.name: Hole, Me
hole_me.description: Fail a trial for the first time and lose the game

flavor_texts.during_unlock: Should have watched where you walk…

laissez_faire.name: Laissez-faire
laissez_faire.description: Win all 5 trials without mashing keys or buying modifiers

flavor_texts.before_unlock: May the odds be with you because the algorithm I found on the internet won’t
flavor_texts.during_unlock: You’ve exposed my poor programming skills!
